What If_

A car could move a crowd?

Back

Juke Box

Can you imagine packing the sound system from Ministry of Sound, one of the world’s top nightclubs, into a Nissan JUKE? We did. With the help of Ministry of Sound and Martin Audio, we re-imagined the JUKE, filling it with one of the club’s famous Box speakers, a PA system, ambient lighting and, of course, a mobile DJ booth. Now, it’s truly a party on wheels.
